  • Optimization
  • View page source

OptimizationÂ¶

ARock currently supports solving convex optimization problems with operator splitting methods. We provide the async-parallel gradient descent method for solving the \(\ell_2\) regularized least squares and logistic regression problems. We also provide async-parallel forward-backward splitting method for solving \(\ell_1\) regularized least squares and logistic regression problems.

  • Regularized Regression
  • Consensus Optimization
  • Decentralized Optimization
